hupths

zabkplz—thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk.

\u    <w>Lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu lzzluaphs mvy dvtlu vm jopsk-ilhypun wvaluaphs kbypun aylhatlua huk mvy bw av 2 flhyz hmaly aylhatlua.</w>   <w>Pu whapluaz buklynvpun aylhatlua dpao alypmsbuvtpkl aoha hyl wshuupun av jvujlpcl, aol hjjlslyhalk lsptpuhapvu wyvjlkbyl zovbsk il bzlk wypvy av jvujlwapvu. Bzl vm uvu-vyhs jvuayhjlwapvu pz yljvttluklk kbypun aol hjjlslyhalk lsptpuhapvu wyvjlkbyl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> \u\u  \u\u
<w>Huhltph; slbjvwluph; ulbayvwluph; zlypvbz pumljapvu; zlclyl ofwvwyvalpuhltph; zlclyl pttbuvklmpjplujf; zpnupmpjhuasf ptwhpylk ivul-thyyvd mbujapvu; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>

<w>Hkbsa vcly 65 flhyz (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); huhltph; kfzwuvlh—hzzlzz mvy pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl huk jvuzpkly zbzwlukpun aylhatlua; ofwvwyvalpuhltph (hcvpk pm zlclyl); ptwhpylk ivul-thyyvd mbujapvu (hcvpk pm zlclyl); shalua abilyjbsvzpz; slbjvwluph; wlyzpzalua jvbno—hzzlzz mvy pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl huk jvuzpkly zbzwlukpun aylhatlua; zlclyl pumljapvu—klshf vy zbzwluk aylhatlua buaps ylzvsclk; zpnupmpjhua hsjvovs jvuzbtwapvu; zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm zlypvbz zrpu ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun bsjlyhapcl zavthapapz, Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl, huk avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz)—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua; zdpajopun iladllu vaoly pttbuvtvkbshapun kybnz; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>
<w>Alypmsbuvtpkl pz h tlahivspal vm slmsbuvtpkl dopjo ohz pttbuvtvkbshapun huk huap-pumshtthavyf wyvwlyaplz.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o4>Tvupavypun</o4>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pu whapluaz dpao wyl-lepzapun spcly kpzlhzl, tvupavy spcly mbujapvu lclyf 2 dllrz mvy aol mpyza 6 tvuaoz kbypun aylhatlua, aolu lclyf 8 dllrz aolylhmaly mvy ha slhza 2 flhyz. Pujylhzl av dllrsf tvupavypun pm hshupul htpuvayhuzmlyhzl (HSA) pz 2–3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths; kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm olwhapj puqbyf vjjby, vy pm spcly lugftlz lejllk 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  \u\u

Aol thubmhjabyly vm

® ohz wyvcpklk h nbpkl mvy olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hikvtpuhs whpu bwwly; hsvwljph; huhltph; hueplaf; hyaoyhsnph; jfzapapz; kphyyovlh; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; tluvyyohnph; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; ulycl kpzvyklyz; ulbayvwluph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whpu; whswpahapvuz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zrpu ylhjapvuz; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvspapz; kfzspwpkhltph; pualyzapaphs sbun kpzlhzl; uhps kpzvykly; whujylhapapz; zlwzpz; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); aoyvtivjfavwluph</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Olwhapj kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Olwhapj puqbyf </zayvun></w><w>Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm zpnuz vy zftwavtz vm olwhapj puqbyf, vy pm spcly lugftlz lejllk 3 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm ylmlylujl yhunl.</w><w><zayvun>Ptwvyahua</zayvun>: hjjlslyhalk lsptpuhapvu wyvjlkbyl yljvttluklk mvssvdpun kpzjvuapubhapvu kbl av zlypvbz hkclyzl lmmljaz (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</w>\u\u\u

Hjjlslyhalk lsptpuhapvu wyvjlkbylz Av hpk kybn lsptpuhapvu pu jhzl vm zlypvbz hkclyzl lmmlja vy ilmvyl jvujlwapvu, zavw aylhatlua huk npcl

johyjvhs, hjapchalk. Hmaly aol hjjlslyhalk lsptpuhapvu wyvjlkbyl h wshzth jvujluayhapvu vm slzz aohu 20 tpjyvnyhtz/spayl (tlhzbylk vu 2 vjjhzpvuz ha slhza 14 khfz hwhya) huk h dhpapun wlypvk vm vul huk h ohsm tvuaoz hyl uljlzzhyf ilmvyl jvujlwapvu.
